text: {| |} USS Cleveland (LCS-31) will be a littoral combat ship of the United States Navy. She will be the fourth commissioned ship in naval service named after Cleveland, the second-largest city in Ohio. Marinette Marine was awarded the contract to build the ship on 15 January 2019. ==References== * Category:Cleveland Category:Freedom-class littoral combat ships Category:Lockheed Martin
title: USS Cleveland (LCS-31)
